ChatDSA.description: Discord Chat Bot using chatGPT to help users navigate the Royal Productions Discord server and provide information about servers
features: Open a chat thread easily with one click
Add context that the AI will be able to use to help users find the correct information

ServerQuery.description: A fully customizable Game Server Query bot written in python
features: Ability to customize every aspect of the bot, from the embed color, to the title on the players graph
JSON support, with MySQL and MariaDB support comming soon
Supports Valves A2S, Minecraft, FiveM/RedM, and SAMP Query API's
